main event: A civilian observed a highly stationary object in the sky over Fort Worth, Texas for approximately 12 minutes before it moved out of sight at high speed.
interesting points: The object was described as whitish in color and cigar-shaped., The sighting was conducted using ground-radar equipment., The observation lasted for a total of 12 minutes., The witness was familiar with all types of US aircraft., No unusual aircraft flights were reported by military agencies during the sighting period.
witness description: Civilian located at 2710 Hemphill, Fort Worth, Texas, with familiarity in aircraft.
